summary.span: 表示要對 SQL Server 資料庫執行的 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: Represents a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a SQL Server database.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體時建立時，讀取/寫入屬性會設定為其初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to their initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 下列方法來執行命令，在 SQL Server 資料庫的功能如下： features the following methods for executing commands at a SQL Server database: |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||起始非同步執行的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序所描述通常執行命令，例如 INSERT、 DELETE、 UPDATE、、 和 SET 陳述式。Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this , generally executing commands such as INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements. 每次呼叫必須搭配呼叫的完成作業，通常在另一個執行緒上的。Each call to must be paired with a call to which finishes the operation, typically on a separate thread.| ||起始非同步執行的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序所描述和一或多個結果集從伺服器擷取。Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this and retrieves one or more results sets from the server. 每次呼叫必須搭配呼叫的完成作業，通常在另一個執行緒上的。Each call to must be paired with a call to which finishes the operation, typically on a separate thread.| ||起始這個 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行。Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this . 每次呼叫`BeginExecuteXmlReader`必須搭配呼叫`EndExecuteXmlReader`，會完成作業，通常位於個別的執行緒，並傳回物件。Each call to `BeginExecuteXmlReader` must be paired with a call to `EndExecuteXmlReader`, which finishes the operation, typically on a separate thread, and returns an object.| ||執行傳回資料列的命令。Executes commands that return rows. 為了提高效能，叫用命令使用 Transact SQL`sp_executesql`系統預存程序。For increased performance, invokes commands using the Transact-SQL `sp_executesql` system stored procedure. 因此，可能沒有您想要使用的效果來執行命令，例如 TRANSACT-SQL SET 陳述式。Therefore, might not have the effect that you want if used to execute commands such as Transact-SQL SET statements.| ||執行命令，例如 TRANSACT-SQL INSERT、 DELETE、 UPDATE 和 SET 陳述式。Executes commands such as Transact-SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.| ||從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database.| ||將 傳送至 並建置 物件。Sends the to the and builds an object.| 您可以重設屬性和重複使用物件。You can reset the property and reuse the object. 不過，您必須先關閉之前可以執行新的或上一個命令。However, you must close the before you can execute a new or previous command. 如果所執行的方法產生、仍保持開啟時的嚴重性層級為 19 或更少。If a is generated by the method executing a , the remains open when the severity level is 19 or less. 伺服器的嚴重性層級 20 或以上時，通常會關閉。When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server ordinarily closes the . 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. > [!NOTE] > 沒有名稱，也稱為 序數，不支援參數由.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server。Nameless, also called ordinal, parameters are not supported by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. ## Examples 下列範例會建立、 ，和。The following example creates a , a , and a . 此範例會讀取整個資料，寫入至主控台。The example reads through the data, writing it to the console. 最後，範例會關閉然後時便會結束`Using`的程式碼區塊。Finally, the example closes the and then the as it exits the `Using` code blocks. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下列範例會示範如何建立和執行不同類型的 SqlCommand 物件。The following sample shows how to create and execute different types of SqlCommand objects. 您必須先建立範例資料庫中，執行下列指令碼：First you must create the sample database, by executing the following script: ``` USE [master] GO CREATE DATABASE [MySchool] GO USE [MySchool] GO SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE procedure [dbo].[CourseExtInfo] @CourseId int as select c.CourseID,c.Title,c.Credits,d.Name as DepartmentName from Course as c left outer join Department as d on c.DepartmentID=d.DepartmentID where c.CourseID=@CourseId GO SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create procedure [dbo].[DepartmentInfo] @DepartmentId int,@CourseCount int output as select @CourseCount=Count(c.CourseID) from course as c where c.DepartmentID=@DepartmentId select d.DepartmentID,d.Name,d.Budget,d.StartDate,d.Administrator from Department as d where d.DepartmentID=@DepartmentId GO SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[GetDepartmentsOfSpecifiedYear] @Year int,@BudgetSum money output AS BEGIN SELECT @BudgetSum=SUM([Budget]) FROM [MySchool].[dbo].[Department] Where YEAR([StartDate])=@Year SELECT [DepartmentID] ,[Name] ,[Budget] ,[StartDate] ,[Administrator] FROM [MySchool].[dbo].[Department] Where YEAR([StartDate])=@Year END GO SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Course]([CourseID] [nvarchar](10) NOT NULL, [Year] [smallint] NOT NULL, [Title] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL, [Credits] [int] NOT NULL, [DepartmentID] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Course] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [CourseID] ASC, [Year] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]) ON [PRIMARY] GO SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Department]([DepartmentID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Name] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [Budget] [money] NOT NULL, [StartDate] [datetime] NOT NULL, [Administrator] [int] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Department] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DepartmentID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]) ON [PRIMARY] GO SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Person]([PersonID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [LastName] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [FirstName] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [HireDate] [datetime] NULL, [EnrollmentDate] [datetime] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_School.Student] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [PersonID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]) ON [PRIMARY] GO SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[StudentGrade]([EnrollmentID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [CourseID] [nvarchar](10) NOT NULL, [StudentID] [int] NOT NULL, [Grade] [decimal](3, 2) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_StudentGrade] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [EnrollmentID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]) ON [PRIMARY] GO SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create view [dbo].[EnglishCourse] as select c.CourseID,c.Title,c.Credits,c.DepartmentID from Course as c join Department as d on c.DepartmentID=d.DepartmentID where d.Name=N'English' GO INSERT [dbo].[Course] ([CourseID], [Year], [Title], [Credits], [DepartmentID]) VALUES (N'C1045', 2012, N'Calculus', 4, 7) INSERT [dbo].[Course] ([CourseID], [Year], [Title], [Credits], [DepartmentID]) VALUES (N'C1061', 2012, N'Physics', 4, 1) INSERT [dbo].[Course] ([CourseID], [Year], [Title], [Credits], [DepartmentID]) VALUES (N'C2021', 2012, N'Composition', 3, 2) INSERT [dbo].[Course] ([CourseID], [Year], [Title], INSERT [dbo].[StudentGrade] ([EnrollmentID], [CourseID], [StudentID], [Grade]) VALUES (13, N'C2021', 5, CAST(3.00 AS Decimal(3, 2))) INSERT [dbo].[StudentGrade] ([EnrollmentID], [CourseID], Decimal(3, 2))) INSERT [dbo].[StudentGrade] ([EnrollmentID], [CourseID], [StudentID], [Grade]) VALUES (16, N'C2042', 3, CAST(4.00 AS Decimal(3, 2))) INSERT [dbo].[StudentGrade] ([EnrollmentID], [CourseID], [StudentID], [Grade]) VALUES (17, N'C2042', 5, CAST(3.00 AS Decimal(3, 2))) SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[StudentGrade] OFF ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Course] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Course_Department] FOREIGN KEY([DepartmentID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Department] ([DepartmentID]) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Course] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Course_Department] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StudentGrade] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StudentGrade_Student] FOREIGN KEY([StudentID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Person] ([PersonID]) GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StudentGrade] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_StudentGrade_Student] GO ``` 接下來，編譯並執行下列：Next, compile and execute the following: ``` using System; using System.Data; using System.Data.SqlClient; using System.Threading.Tasks; class Program { static class SqlHelper { // Set the connection, command, and then execute the command with non query. public static Int32 ExecuteNonQuery(String connectionString, String commandText, CommandType commandType, params SqlParameter[] parameters) { using (SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connectionString)) { using (SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(commandText, conn)) { // There're three command types: StoredProcedure, Text, TableDirect. The TableDirect // type is only for OLE DB. cmd.CommandType = commandType; cmd.Parameters.AddRange(parameters); conn.Open(); return cmd.ExecuteNonQuery(); } } } // Set the connection, command, and then execute the command and only return one value. public static Object ExecuteScalar(String connectionString, String commandText, CommandType commandType, params SqlParameter[] parameters) { using (SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connectionString)) { using (SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(commandText, conn)) { cmd.CommandType = commandType; cmd.Parameters.AddRange(parameters); conn.Open(); return cmd.ExecuteScalar(); } } } // Set the connection, command, and then execute the command with query and return the reader. public static SqlDataReader ExecuteReader(String connectionString, String commandText, CommandType commandType, params SqlParameter[] parameters) { SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connectionString); using (SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(commandText, conn)) { cmd.CommandType = commandType; cmd.Parameters.AddRange(parameters); conn.Open(); // When using CommandBehavior.CloseConnection, the connection will be closed when the // IDataReader is closed. SqlDataReader reader = cmd.ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.CloseConnection); return reader; } } } static void Main(string[] args) { String connectionString = "Data Source=(local);Initial Catalog=MySchool;Integrated Security=True;Asynchronous Processing=true;"; CountCourses(connectionString, 2012); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Following result is the departments that started from 2007:"); GetDepartments(connectionString, 2007); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Add the credits when the credits of course is lower than 4."); AddCredits(connectionString, 4); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Please press any key to exit..."); Console.ReadKey(); } static void CountCourses(String connectionString, Int32 year) { String commandText = "Select Count([CourseID]) FROM [MySchool].[dbo].[Course] Where Year=@Year"; SqlParameter parameterYear = new SqlParameter("@Year", SqlDbType.Int); parameterYear.Value = year; Object oValue = SqlHelper.ExecuteScalar(connectionString, commandText, CommandType.Text, parameterYear); Int32 count; if (Int32.TryParse(oValue.ToString(), out count)) Console.WriteLine("There {0} {1} course{2} in {3}.", count > 1 ? "are" : "is", count, count > 1 ? "s" : null, year); } // Display the Departments that start from the specified year. static void GetDepartments(String connectionString, Int32 year) { String commandText = "dbo.GetDepartmentsOfSpecifiedYear"; // Specify the year of StartDate SqlParameter parameterYear = new SqlParameter("@Year", SqlDbType.Int); parameterYear.Value = year; // When the direction of parameter is set as Output, you can get the value after // executing the command. SqlParameter parameterBudget = new SqlParameter("@BudgetSum", SqlDbType.Money); parameterBudget.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; using (SqlDataReader reader = SqlHelper.ExecuteReader(connectionString, commandText, CommandType.StoredProcedure, parameterYear, parameterBudget)) { Console.WriteLine("{0,-20}{1,-20}{2,-20}{3,-20}", "Name", "Budget", "StartDate", "Administrator"); while (reader.Read()) { Console.WriteLine("{0,-20}{1,-20:C}{2,-20:d}{3,-20}", reader["Name"], reader["Budget"], reader["StartDate"], reader["Administrator"]); } } Console.WriteLine("{0,-20}{1,-20:C}", "Sum:", parameterBudget.Value); } // If credits of course is lower than the certain value, the method will add the credits. static void AddCredits(String connectionString, Int32 creditsLow) { String commandText = "Update [MySchool].[dbo].[Course] Set Credits=Credits+1 Where Credits<@Credits"; SqlParameter parameterCredits = new SqlParameter("@Credits", creditsLow); Int32 rows = SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(connectionString, commandText, CommandType.Text, parameterCredits); Console.WriteLine("{0} row{1} {2} updated.", rows, rows > 1 ? "s" : null, rows > 1 ? "are" : "is"); } } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動以非同步方式執行的程序[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]陳述式或預存程序不會傳回資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作。The method starts the process of asynchronously executing a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] statement or stored procedure that does not return rows, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing. 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫方法，以完成該操作。When the statement has completed, developers must call the method to finish the operation. 方法會立即傳回 (對)，但是直到執行的程式碼對應方法呼叫，它必須執行開始同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫針對相同物件。The method returns immediately ( has no effect on ), but until the code executes the corresponding method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same object. 呼叫命令執行已完成的原因之前來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。Calling the before the command's execution is completed causes the object to block until the execution is finished. 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously. 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes. 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous. 這個多載不支援回呼程序，因為開發人員必須是輪詢來判斷是否已完成命令，使用屬性傳回方法或等候完成的作業一或多個命令使用屬性傳回之。Because this overload does not support a callback procedure, developers must either poll to determine whether the command has completed, using the property of the returned by the method; or wait for the completion of one or more commands using the property of the returned . ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式會建立內的更新資料**AdventureWorks**範例資料庫中，以非同步方式執行其工作。The following console application creates updates data within the **AdventureWorks** sample database, doing its work asynchronously. 為了模擬長期執行的處理序，此範例會將 WAITFOR 陳述式插入命令文字中。In order to emulate a long-running process, this example inserts a WAITFOR statement in the command text. 一般來說，您不需要花費努力讓命令執行速度變慢，但在此情況下這樣做可以更容易示範非同步行為。Normally, you would not take efforts to make your commands run slower, but doing this in this case makes it easier to demonstrate the asynchronous behavior. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteNonQuery/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序不會傳回資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。The method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that does not return rows, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing. 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫方法，以完成該操作。When the statement has completed, developers must call the method to finish the operation. 方法會立即傳回 (對)，但是直到執行的程式碼對應方法呼叫，它必須執行開始同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫針對相同物件。The method returns immediately ( has no effect on ), but until the code executes the corresponding method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same object. 呼叫命令執行已完成的原因之前來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。Calling the before the command's execution is completed causes the object to block until the execution is finished. `callback`參數可讓您指定陳述式完成時呼叫的委派。The `callback` parameter lets you specify an delegate that is called when the statement has completed. 您可以呼叫方法從這個委派程序，或從您的應用程式中的任何其他位置。You can call the method from within this delegate procedure, or from any other location within your application. 此外，您可以傳遞任何物件在`asyncStateObject`參數，且您的回呼程序可以使用此資訊擷取屬性。In addition, you can pass any object in the `asyncStateObject` parameter, and your callback procedure can retrieve this information using the property. 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously. 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes. 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous. 因為 Microsoft.NET common language runtime 所提供的背景執行緒內，從執行回呼程序，是非常重要的是運用嚴格的方法處理您的應用程式中的跨執行緒互動。Because the callback procedure executes from within a background thread supplied by the Microsoft .NET common language runtime, it is very important that you take a rigorous approach to handling cross-thread interactions from within your applications. 例如，您不能與互動表單的內容，從回呼程序; 內您一定要更新的表單，您必須切換回到表單的執行緒才能執行您的工作。For example, you must not interact with a form's contents from within your callback procedure; should you have to update the form, you must switch back to the form's thread in order to do your work. 本主題中的範例將示範這個行為。The example in this topic demonstrates this behavior. 所有作業執行期間發生的錯誤會擲都回做為回呼程序中的例外狀況。All errors that occur during the execution of the operation are thrown as exceptions in the callback procedure. 您必須處理的例外狀況，而非在主應用程式中回呼程序。You must handle the exception in the callback procedure, not in the main application. 在回呼程序中處理例外狀況，請參閱本主題的其他資訊的範例。See the example in this topic for additional information on handling exceptions in the callback procedure. ## Examples 下列 Windows 應用程式示範如何使用執行包含數個秒延遲 （模擬長時間執行命令） 的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式的方法。The following Windows application demonstrates the use of the method, executing a Transact-SQL statement that includes a delay of several seconds (emulating a long-running command). 此範例示範許多重要的技巧。This example demonstrates many important techniques. 這包括呼叫的方法，從個別的執行緒之表單互動。This includes calling a method that interacts with the form from a separate thread. 此外，此範例示範如何阻止使用者多次執行命令，並稱為方式，您必須先確定回呼程序之前不會關閉表單。In addition, this example demonstrates how you must block users from executing a command multiple times concurrently, and how you must make sure that the form does not close before the callback procedure is called. 若要設定此範例，請建立新的 Windows 應用程式。To set up this example, create a new Windows application. Put控制項和（接受每個控制項的預設名稱） 的表單上的控制項。Put a control and a control on the form (accepting the default name for each control). 將下列程式碼加入至表單類別，並視需要針對您的環境需要修改連接字串。Add the following code to the form's class, modifying the connection string as needed for your environment. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序傳回資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。The method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that returns rows, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing. 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫方法來完成該操作並擷取命令所傳回。When the statement has completed, developers must call the method to finish the operation and retrieve the returned by the command. 方法會立即傳回，但之前執行的程式碼對應方法呼叫，它必須執行開始針對相同的同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫物件。The method returns immediately, but until the code executes the corresponding method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same object. 呼叫命令執行已完成的原因之前來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。Calling the before the command's execution is completed causes the object to block until the execution is finished. 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously. 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes. 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous. 雖然非同步命令執行，但值擷取仍會同步。Although command execution is asynchronous, value fetching is still synchronous. 這表示呼叫可能封鎖需要更多資料時，基礎網路的讀取作業封鎖。This means that calls to may block if more data is required and the underlying network's read operation blocks. 這個多載不支援回呼程序，因為開發人員必須是輪詢來判斷是否已完成命令，使用屬性傳回方法或等候完成的作業一或多個命令使用屬性傳回之。Because this overload does not support a callback procedure, developers must either poll to determine whether the command has completed, using the property of the returned by the method; or wait for the completion of one or more commands using the property of the returned . 如果您使用或存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。If you use or to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each. 若要避免這個問題，請使用或讀取 FOR XML 查詢。To avoid this behavior, use or to read FOR XML queries. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式開始以非同步方式擷取的資料讀取器程序。The following console application starts the process of retrieving a data reader asynchronously. 等候結果，這個簡單的應用程式位於在迴圈中，調查屬性值。While waiting for the results, this simple application sits in a loop, investigating the property value. 一旦完成程序程式碼會擷取並顯示其內容。As soon as the process has completed, the code retrieves the and displays its contents. Public Function BeginExecuteReader (behavior As CommandBehavior) As IAsyncResult

param.name: behavior
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示陳述式執行和資料擷取的選項。

span.span: One of the values, indicating options for statement execution and data retrieval.

summary.span: 藉由使用其中一個 值，起始這個 所描述之 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序的非同步執行。

span.span: Initiates the asynchronous execution of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that is described by this using one of the values.

returns.span: ，可用於輪詢或等待結果 (或兩者)；叫用 (會傳回可用以擷取所傳回資料列的 執行個體) 時，也需要這個值。

span.span: An that can be used to poll, wait for results, or both; this value is also needed when invoking , which returns a instance that can be used to retrieve the returned rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序傳回資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。The method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that returns rows, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing. 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫方法來完成該操作並擷取命令所傳回。When the statement has completed, developers must call the method to finish the operation and retrieve the returned by the command. 方法會立即傳回，但之前執行的程式碼對應方法呼叫，它必須執行開始針對相同的同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫物件。The method returns immediately, but until the code executes the corresponding method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same object. 呼叫命令執行已完成的原因之前來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。Calling the before the command's execution is completed causes the object to block until the execution is finished. `behavior`參數可讓您指定選項以控制命令和其連線的行為。The `behavior` parameter lets you specify options that control the behavior of the command and its connection. 這些值可以合併在一起 (使用的程式設計語言`OR`運算子)，一般而言，開發人員使用`CommandBehavior.CloseConnection`值，以確定此連接由執行階段關閉時已關閉。These values can be combined together (using the programming language's `OR` operator); generally, developers use the `CommandBehavior.CloseConnection` value to make sure that the connection is closed by the runtime when the is closed. 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously. 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes. 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous. 雖然非同步命令執行，但值擷取仍會同步。Although command execution is asynchronous, value fetching is still synchronous. 這表示呼叫可能封鎖需要更多資料時，基礎網路的讀取作業封鎖。This means that calls to may block if more data is required and the underlying network's read operation blocks. 這個多載不支援回呼程序，因為開發人員必須是輪詢來判斷是否已完成命令，使用屬性傳回方法或等候完成的作業一或多個命令使用屬性傳回之。Because this overload does not support a callback procedure, developers must either poll to determine whether the command has completed, using the property of the returned by the method; or wait for the completion of one or more commands using the property of the returned . 如果您使用或存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。If you use or to access XML data, SQL Server returns any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each. 若要避免這個問題，請使用或讀取 FOR XML 查詢。To avoid this behavior, use or to read FOR XML queries. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式開始以非同步方式擷取的資料讀取器程序。The following console application starts the process of retrieving a data reader asynchronously. 等候結果，這個簡單的應用程式位於在迴圈中，調查屬性值。While waiting for the results, this simple application sits in a loop, investigating the property value. 當處理程序完成之後時，程式碼會擷取並顯示其內容。Once the process has completed, the code retrieves the and displays its contents. 這個範例也會傳遞`CommandBehavior.CloseConnection`和`CommandBehavior.SingleRow`行為的參數，造成關閉的連接中的值並傳回已關閉，並針對單一資料列結果進行最佳化。This example also passes the `CommandBehavior.CloseConnection` and `CommandBehavior.SingleRow` values in the behavior parameter, causing the connection to be closed with the returned is closed, and to optimize for a single row result. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReaderAsyncSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReaderAsyncSimple/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReaderAsyncSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteReaderAsyncSimple/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序傳回資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。The method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure that returns rows, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing. 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫方法來完成該操作並擷取命令所傳回。When the statement has completed, developers must call the method to finish the operation and retrieve the returned by the command. 方法會立即傳回，但之前執行的程式碼對應方法呼叫，它必須執行開始針對相同的同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫物件。The method returns immediately, but until the code executes the corresponding method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same object. 呼叫完成執行命令之前原因來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。Calling the before the command's execution is completed cause the object to block until the execution is finished. `callback`參數可讓您指定陳述式完成時呼叫的委派。The `callback` parameter lets you specify an delegate that is called when the statement has completed. 您可以呼叫方法從這個委派程序，或從您的應用程式中的任何其他位置。You can call the method from within this delegate procedure, or from any other location within your application. 此外，您可以傳遞任何物件在`stateObject`參數，且您的回呼程序可以使用此資訊擷取屬性。In addition, you can pass any object in the `stateObject` parameter, and your callback procedure can retrieve this information using the property. 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously. 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes. 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous. 雖然非同步命令執行，但值擷取仍會同步。Although command execution is asynchronous, value fetching is still synchronous. 這表示呼叫可能封鎖需要更多資料時，基礎網路的讀取作業封鎖。This means that calls to may block if more data is required and the underlying network's read operation blocks. 因為 Microsoft.NET runtime 所提供的背景執行緒內，從執行回呼程序，是非常重要的是運用嚴格的方法處理您的應用程式中的跨執行緒互動。Because the callback procedure executes from within a background thread supplied by the Microsoft .NET runtime, it is very important that you take a rigorous approach to handling cross-thread interactions from within your applications. 例如，您不能與互動表單的內容，從回呼程序; 內您一定要更新的表單，您必須切換回到表單的執行緒才能執行您的工作。For example, you must not interact with a form's contents from within your callback procedure; should you have to update the form, you must switch back to the form's thread in order to do your work. 本主題中的範例將示範這個行為。The example in this topic demonstrates this behavior. 所有作業執行期間發生的錯誤會擲都回做為回呼程序中的例外狀況。All errors that occur during the execution of the operation are thrown as exceptions in the callback procedure. 您必須處理的例外狀況，而非在主應用程式中回呼程序。You must handle the exception in the callback procedure, not in the main application. 在回呼程序中處理例外狀況，請參閱本主題的其他資訊的範例。See the example in this topic for additional information on handling exceptions in the callback procedure. 如果您使用或存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。If you use or to access XML data, SQL Server returns any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each. 若要避免這個問題，請使用或讀取 FOR XML 查詢。To avoid this behavior, use or to read FOR XML queries. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. ## Examples 下列 Windows 應用程式示範 方法的用法，它會執行包含數秒延遲 (模擬長時間執行命令) 的 Transact-SQL 陳述式。The following Windows application demonstrates the use of the method, executing a Transact-SQL statement that includes a delay of a few seconds (emulating a long-running command). 因為此範例會以非同步方式執行命令，表單在等待結果時仍然能夠保持回應。Because the sample executes the command asynchronously, the form remains responsive while awaiting the results. 此範例會將執行物件當做`stateObject`參數; 這樣可以方便擷取物件從回呼程序內，讓程式碼可以呼叫方法對應到初始呼叫。This example passes the executing object as the `stateObject` parameter; doing so makes it simple to retrieve the object from within the callback procedure, so that the code can call the method corresponding to the initial call to . 此範例示範許多重要的技巧。This example demonstrates many important techniques. 這包括呼叫的方法，從個別的執行緒之表單互動。This includes calling a method that interacts with the form from a separate thread. 此外，此範例示範如何阻止使用者多次執行命令，並稱為方式，您必須先確定回呼程序之前不會關閉表單。In addition, this example demonstrates how you must block users from executing a command multiple times concurrently, and how you must make sure that the form does not close before the callback procedure is called. 若要設定此範例，請建立新的 Windows 應用程式。To set up this example, create a new Windows application. Put控制項，控制項和（接受每個控制項的預設名稱） 的表單上的控制項。Put a control, a control, and a control on the form (accepting the default name for each control). 將下列程式碼加入至表單類別，並視需要針對您的環境需要修改連接字串。Add the following code to the form's class, modifying the connection string as needed for your environment. it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same object. 呼叫命令執行已完成的原因之前來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。Calling the before the command's execution is completed causes the object to block until the execution is finished. `callback`參數可讓您指定陳述式完成時呼叫的委派。The `callback` parameter lets you specify an delegate that is called when the statement has completed. 您可以呼叫方法從這個委派程序，或從您的應用程式中的任何其他位置。You can call the method from within this delegate procedure, or from any other location within your application. 此外，您可以傳遞任何物件在`stateObject`參數，且您的回呼程序可以使用此資訊擷取屬性。In addition, you can pass any object in the `stateObject` parameter, and your callback procedure can retrieve this information using the property. `behavior`參數可讓您指定選項以控制命令和其連線的行為。The `behavior` parameter lets you specify options that control the behavior of the command and its connection. 這些值可以合併在一起 (使用的程式設計語言`Or`運算子)，一般而言，開發人員使用`CloseConnection`值，以確定此連接由執行階段關閉時已關閉。These values can be combined together (using the programming language's `Or` operator); generally, developers use the `CloseConnection` value to make sure that the connection is closed by the runtime when the is closed. 開發人員也可以最佳化的行為藉由指定`SingleRow`時它會事先知道的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式或預存程序只傳回單一資料列的值。Developers can also optimize the behavior of the by specifying the `SingleRow` value when it is known in advance that the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure only returns a single row. 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously. 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes. 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous. 雖然非同步命令執行，但值擷取仍會同步。Although command execution is asynchronous, value fetching is still synchronous. 這表示呼叫可能封鎖需要更多資料時，基礎網路的讀取作業封鎖。This means that calls to may block if more data is required and the underlying network's read operation blocks. 因為 Microsoft.NET common language runtime 所提供的背景執行緒內，從執行回呼程序，是非常重要的是運用嚴格的方法處理您的應用程式中的跨執行緒互動。Because the callback procedure executes from within a background thread supplied by the Microsoft .NET common language runtime, it is very important that you take a rigorous approach to handling cross-thread interactions from within your applications. 例如，您不能互動與來自您回呼程序中的表單的內容應該更新表單，您必須切換回到表單的執行緒才能執行您的工作。For example, you must not interact with a form's contents from within your callback procedure--should you have to update the form, you must switch back to the form's thread in order to do your work. 本主題中的範例將示範這個行為。The example in this topic demonstrates this behavior. 所有作業執行期間發生的錯誤會擲都回做為回呼程序中的例外狀況。All errors that occur during the execution of the operation are thrown as exceptions in the callback procedure. 您必須處理的例外狀況，而非在主應用程式中回呼程序。You must handle the exception in the callback procedure, not in the main application. 在回呼程序中處理例外狀況，請參閱本主題的其他資訊的範例。See the example in this topic for additional information on handling exceptions in the callback procedure. 如果您使用或存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。If you use or to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each. 若要避免這個問題，請使用或讀取 FOR XML 查詢。To avoid this behavior, use or to read FOR XML queries. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. ## Examples 下列 Windows 應用程式示範 方法的用法，它會執行包含數秒延遲 (模擬長時間執行命令) 的 Transact-SQL 陳述式。The following Windows application demonstrates the use of the method, executing a Transact-SQL statement that includes a delay of a few seconds (emulating a long-running command). 因為此範例會以非同步方式執行命令，表單在等待結果時仍然能夠保持回應。Because the sample executes the command asynchronously, the form remains responsive while awaiting the results. 此範例會將執行物件當做`stateObject`參數; 這樣可以方便擷取物件從回呼程序內，讓程式碼可以呼叫方法對應到初始呼叫。This example passes the executing object as the `stateObject` parameter; doing so makes it simple to retrieve the object from within the callback procedure, so that the code can call the method corresponding to the initial call to . 此範例示範許多重要的技巧。This example demonstrates many important techniques. 這包括呼叫的方法，從個別的執行緒之表單互動。This includes calling a method that interacts with the form from a separate thread. 此外，此範例示範如何阻止使用者多次執行命令，並稱為方式，您必須先確定回呼程序之前不會關閉表單。In addition, this example demonstrates how you must block users from executing a command multiple times concurrently, and how you must make sure that the form does not close before the callback procedure is called. 若要設定此範例，請建立新的 Windows 應用程式。To set up this example, create a new Windows application. Put控制項，控制項和（接受每個控制項的預設名稱） 的表單上的控制項。Put a control, a control, and a control on the form (accepting the default name for each control). 將下列程式碼加入至表單類別，並視需要針對您的環境需要修改連接字串。Add the following code to the form's class, modifying the connection string as needed for your environment. 這個範例會傳遞`CommandBehavior.CloseConnection`值`behavior`參數，導致傳回它已關閉時，自動關閉的連接。This example passes the `CommandBehavior.CloseConnection` value in the `behavior` parameter, causing the returned to automatically close its connection when it is closed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動以非同步方式執行 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式會傳回為 XML，資料列，以便同時執行的陳述式時，才執行其他工作的程序。The method starts the process of asynchronously executing a Transact-SQL statement that returns rows as XML, so that other tasks can run concurrently while the statement is executing. 當陳述式完成時，開發人員必須呼叫`EndExecuteXmlReader`命令所傳回的方法來完成該操作並擷取的 XML。When the statement has completed, developers must call the `EndExecuteXmlReader` method to finish the operation and retrieve the XML returned by the command. 方法會立即傳回，但之前執行的程式碼對應`EndExecuteXmlReader`方法呼叫，它必須執行開始針對相同的同步或非同步執行的其他任何呼叫物件。The method returns immediately, but until the code executes the corresponding `EndExecuteXmlReader` method call, it must not execute any other calls that start a synchronous or asynchronous execution against the same object. 呼叫`EndExecuteXmlReader`命令執行已完成的原因之前來封鎖，直到執行完成的物件。Calling the `EndExecuteXmlReader` before the command's execution is completed causes the object to block until the execution is finished. 屬性通常指定有效的 FOR XML 子句的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式。The property ordinarily specifies a Transact-SQL statement with a valid FOR XML clause. 不過，`CommandText`也可以指定傳回的陳述式`ntext`包含有效的 XML 資料。However, `CommandText` can also specify a statement that returns `ntext` data that contains valid XML. 一般查詢可以進行格式化，如下列 C# 範例所示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` SqlCommand command = new SqlCommand("SELECT ContactID, FirstName, LastName FROM dbo.Contact FOR XML AUTO, XMLDATA", SqlConn); ``` 這個方法也可用來擷取單一資料列、 單一資料行的結果集。This method can also be used to retrieve a single-row, single-column result set. 在此情況下，如果多個會傳回一個資料列，`EndExecuteXmlReader`方法會附加至剩下的結果集上第一個資料列，並捨棄的值。In this case, if more than one row is returned, the `EndExecuteXmlReader` method attaches the to the value on the first row, and discards the rest of the result set. 多個作用中結果集 (MARS) 功能可讓多個動作，使用相同的連接。The multiple active result set (MARS) feature lets multiple actions use the same connection. 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously. 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。If a large command or many parameters are sent, this method may block during writes. 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous. 雖然非同步命令執行，但值擷取仍會同步。Although command execution is asynchronous, value fetching is still synchronous. 若要判斷是否已完成命令，使用這個多載不支援回呼程序，因為開發人員需要任一輪詢屬性傳回方法; 或完成的等候一或多個命令使用屬性傳回之。Because this overload does not support a callback procedure, developers need to either poll to determine whether the command has completed, using the property of the returned by the method; or wait for the completion of one or more commands using the property of the returned . 如果您使用或存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。If you use or to access XML data, SQL Server returns any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each. 若要避免這個問題，請使用或讀取 FOR XML 查詢。To avoid this behavior, use or to read FOR XML queries. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式開始以非同步方式擷取 XML 資料的程序。The following console application starts the process of retrieving XML data asynchronously. 等候結果，這個簡單的應用程式位於在迴圈中，調查屬性值。While waiting for the results, this simple application sits in a loop, investigating the property value. 處理程序完成後，請將程式碼會擷取的 XML，並顯示其內容。Once the process has completed, the code retrieves the XML and displays its contents. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlCommand.BeginExecuteXmlReader/VB/source.vb#1)]

(MARS) 功能可讓多個動作，使用相同的連接。The multiple active result set (MARS) feature lets multiple actions use the same connection. `callback`參數可讓您指定陳述式完成時呼叫的委派。The `callback` parameter lets you specify an delegate that is called when the statement has completed. 您可以呼叫方法從這個委派程序，或從您的應用程式中的任何其他位置。You can call the method from within this delegate procedure, or from any other location within your application. 此外，您可以傳遞任何物件在`stateObject`參數，且您的回呼程序可以使用此資訊擷取屬性。In addition, you can pass any object in the `stateObject` parameter, and your callback procedure can retrieve this information using the property. 請注意，命令文字和參數會傳送到伺服器以同步方式。Note that the command text and parameters are sent to the server synchronously. 如果傳送較大的命令或許多參數，這個方法可能會封鎖寫入期間。If a large command or many parameters is sent, this method may block during writes. 傳送命令，方法會立即傳回而不想等待伺服器回應之後，讀取是非同步。After the command is sent, the method returns immediately without waiting for an answer from the server--that is, reads are asynchronous. 所有作業執行期間發生的錯誤會擲都回做為回呼程序中的例外狀況。All errors that occur during the execution of the operation are thrown as exceptions in the callback procedure. 您必須處理的例外狀況，而非在主應用程式中回呼程序。You must handle the exception in the callback procedure, not in the main application. 在回呼程序中處理例外狀況，請參閱本主題的其他資訊的範例。See the example in this topic for additional information on handling exceptions in the callback procedure. 如果您使用或存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。If you use or to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each. 若要避免這個問題，請使用或讀取 FOR XML 查詢。To avoid this behavior, use or to read FOR XML queries. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. ## Examples 下列 Windows 應用程式示範 方法的用法，它會執行包含數秒延遲 (模擬長時間執行命令) 的 Transact-SQL 陳述式。The following Windows application demonstrates the use of the method, executing a Transact-SQL statement that includes a delay of a few seconds (emulating a long-running command). 此範例會將執行物件當做`stateObject`參數-如此一來您輕鬆地擷取物件從回呼程序內，讓程式碼可以呼叫方法對應到初始呼叫。This example passes the executing object as the `stateObject` parameter--doing so makes it simple to retrieve the object from within the callback procedure, so that the code can call the method corresponding to the initial call to . 此範例示範許多重要的技巧。This example demonstrates many important techniques. 這包括呼叫的方法，從個別的執行緒之表單互動。This includes calling a method that interacts with the form from a separate thread. 此外，此範例示範如何阻止使用者多次執行命令，並稱為方式，您必須先確定回呼程序之前不會關閉表單。In addition, this example demonstrates how you must block users from executing a command multiple times concurrently, and how you must make sure that the form does not close before the callback procedure is called. 若要設定此範例，請建立新的 Windows 應用程式。To set up this example, create a new Windows application. Put控制項，控制項和（接受每個控制項的預設名稱） 的表單上的控制項。Put a control, a control, and a control on the form (accepting the default name for each control). 將下列程式碼加入至表單類別，並視需要針對您的環境需要修改連接字串。Add the following code to the form's class, modifying the connection string as needed for your environment. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有要取消的作業，則不會發生任何狀況。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing occurs. 不過，如果正在進行命令，而取消作業的嘗試失敗，則不會產生任何例外狀況 (Exception)。However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated. 在某些罕見的情況下，如果您呼叫然後呼叫(implicitily 或明確) 然後再呼叫，然後呼叫、 取消命令不會傳送到 SQL Server 和結果集可以繼續將串流處理之後呼叫。In some, rare, cases, if you call then call (implicitily or explicitly) before calling , and then call , the cancel command will not be sent to SQL Server and the result set can continue to stream after you call . 若要避免這個問題，請確定您呼叫之前關閉讀取器或連接。To avoid this, make sure that you call before closing the reader or connection. ## Examples 下列範例示範 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. summary.span: 針對連接執行 Transact-SQL 陳述式，並傳回受影響的資料列數目。

span.span: Executes a Transact-SQL statement against the connection and returns the number of rows affected.

returns.span: 受影響的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用來執行資料庫目錄作業 （例如，查詢資料庫的結構或建立資料庫物件，例如資料表），或變更資料庫中的資料，而不使用藉由執行更新、 插入或刪除陳述式。You can use the to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables), or to change the data in a database without using a by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 雖然會傳回任何資料列時，任何輸出參數或傳回對應至參數的值會以資料填入。Although the returns no rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 當觸發程序會存在於資料表所插入或更新的範圍時，則傳回值包括受到 insert 或 update 作業以及由觸發程序或觸發程序影響的資料列數目的資料列數目。When a trigger exists on a table being inserted or updated, the return value includes the number of rows affected by both the insert or update operation and the number of rows affected by the trigger or triggers. 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. 如果需要進行復原，傳回值也是-1。If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，然後執行它使用。The following example creates a and then executes it using . 此範例會傳遞 （例如 UPDATE、 INSERT 或 DELETE） 的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式的字串，用來連接到資料來源的字串。The example is passed a string that is a Transact-SQL statement (such as UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE) and a string to use to connect to the data source. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`、屬性應該設定為預存程序的名稱。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 命令執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . > [!NOTE] > 如果交易發生死結時，可能不會擲回例外狀況之前呼叫。If a transaction is deadlocked, an exception may not be thrown until is called. 多個作用中結果集 (MARS) 功能可讓多個動作使用相同的連接。The multiple active result set (MARS) feature allows for multiple actions using the same connection. 如果您使用或存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。If you use or to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each. 若要避免這個問題，請使用或讀取 FOR XML 查詢。To avoid this behavior, use or to read FOR XML queries. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，然後執行它，藉由傳遞字串，是 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 陳述式和用來連接到資料來源的字串。The following example creates a , and then executes it by passing a string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the data source. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ExecuteScalar() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ExecuteScalar () As Object

summary.span: 執行查詢，並傳回查詢所傳回的結果集第一個資料列的第一個資料行。

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

summary.span: 會忽略其他的資料行或資料列。

span.span: Additional columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: 結果集中第一個資料列的第一個資料行；如果結果集是空的，則為 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the result set is empty.

returns.span: 最多傳回 2033 個字元。

span.span: Returns a maximum of 2033 characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. 這需要較少的程式碼比使用方法，並接著執行作業，您需要產生單一值使用所傳回的資料。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations that you need to generate the single value using the data returned by a . 一般查詢可以進行格式化，如下列 C# 範例所示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` cmd.CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dbo.region"; Int32 count = (Int32) cmd.ExecuteScalar(); ``` ## Examples 下列範例會建立，然後執行它使用。The following example creates a and then executes it using . 此範例會傳遞字串，表示要插入至資料表時，新的值，用來連接到資料來源的字串。The example is passed a string representing a new value to be inserted into a table, and a string to use to connect to the data source. 此函數會傳回新**識別**如果已插入新的資料列的資料行值、 0 失敗。The function returns the new **Identity** column value if a new row was inserted, 0 on failure. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常會指定[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]具有有效的 FOR XML 子句的陳述式。The property ordinarily specifies a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] statement with a valid FOR XML clause. 不過，也可以指定傳回的陳述式`ntext`或`nvarchar`包含有效的 XML 或與定義的資料行的內容資料`xml`資料型別。However, can also specify a statement that returns `ntext` or `nvarchar` data that contains valid XML, or the contents of a column defined with the `xml` data type. 一般查詢可以進行格式化，如下列的 Microsoft Visual C# 範例所示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following Microsoft Visual C# example: ``` SqlCommand command = new SqlCommand("SELECT * FROM dbo.Customers FOR XML AUTO, XMLDATA", SqlConn); ``` 這個方法也可用來擷取單一資料列、 單一資料行的結果集，其中包含 XML 資料。This method can also be used to retrieve a single-row, single-column result set that contains XML data. 在此情況下，如果多個會傳回一個資料列，方法會附加至剩下的結果集上第一個資料列，並捨棄的值。In this case, if more than one row is returned, the method attaches the to the value on the first row, and discards the rest of the result set. 多個作用中結果集 (MARS) 功能可讓多個動作使用相同的連接。The multiple active result set (MARS) feature allows for multiple actions using the same connection. 如果您使用或存取 XML 資料，SQL Server 會傳回任何 XML 結果大於 2,033 字元的多個資料列的 2,033 字元的長度。If you use or to access XML data, SQL Server will return any XML results greater than 2,033 characters in length in multiple rows of 2,033 characters each. 若要避免這個問題，請使用或讀取 FOR XML 查詢。To avoid this behavior, use or to read FOR XML queries. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q310378，"PRB:: XML 資料會被截斷時您使用 SqlDataReader，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article Q310378, "PRB: XML Data Is Truncated When You Use SqlDataReader," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，然後執行它使用。The following example creates a and then executes it using . 此範例會傳遞為 TRANSACT-SQL FOR XML SELECT 陳述式的字串，用來連接到資料來源的字串。The example is passed a string that is a Transact-SQL FOR XML SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteXmlReader/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定繫結至這個命令的 物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the object bound to this command.

value.span: 設為 null (預設值) 時，不應要求任何告知。

span.span: When set to null (default), no notification should be requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須先設定此屬性的值，才能執行命令，才會生效。You must set the value for this property before the command is executed for it to take effect.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NotificationAutoEnlist { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式是否應該從通用 物件自動接收查詢告知。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application should automatically receive query notifications from a common object.

value.span: **true**如果應用程式應該自動接收查詢通知，否則**false**。

span.span: **true** if the application should automatically receive query notifications; otherwise **false**.
The default value is **true**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項功能用於 ASP.NET 應用程式中，以接收通知之所有 ASP 網頁對 SQL Server 中執行的命令。This feature is used in ASP.NET applications to receive notifications for all commands executed in an ASP page against SQL Server. 這可讓 ASP.NET 快取的頁面，直到用來呈現頁面的查詢會產生不同的結果。This enables ASP.NET to cache the page until the queries used to render the page would produce a different result. 自動登記。Automatic enlistment. 這個屬性只適用於支援查詢通知的 SQL Server 版本。This property applies only to versions of SQL Server that support query notifications. 針對先前的版本，此屬性設定為**true**對應用程式沒有影響。For earlier versions, setting this property to **true** has no effect on the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 不支援問號 （？） 預留位置來傳遞參數至 SQL 陳述式或預存程序呼叫的命令`CommandType.Text`。The Microsoft .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to a SQL Statement or a stored procedure called by a command of `CommandType.Text`. 在此情況下，您必須使用具名的參數。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如: For example: 選取 \* FROM Customers，CustomerID = @CustomerIDSELECT \* FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = @CustomerID > [!NOTE] > 如果集合中的參數不符合查詢的需求，要執行，可能會產生錯誤。If the parameters in the collection do not match the requirements of the query to be executed, an error may result. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定參數和參數資料型別](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立並加入參數，以便。The following example demonstrates how to create a and add parameters to the . [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParameterCollection.AddWithValue/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在 SQL Server 的執行個體上建立命令的預備版本。

span.span: Creates a prepared version of the command on an instance of SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設`StoredProcedure`，呼叫應該會成功，但它可能會不造成任何作業。If is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to should succeed, although it may cause a no-op. 之前先呼叫，先備妥的陳述式中指定的每個參數的資料類型。Before you call , specify the data type of each parameter in the statement to be prepared. 針對每個參數具有可變長度資料類型，您必須設定屬性所需的最大大小。For each parameter that has a variable length data type, you must set the property to the maximum size needed. 如果不符合這些條件會傳回錯誤。 returns an error if these conditions are not met. > [!NOTE] > 如果要將資料庫內容變更藉由執行 TRANSACT-SQL`USE `陳述式，或藉由呼叫方法，然後必須呼叫第二次。If the database context is changed by executing the Transact-SQL `USE ` statement, or by calling the method, then must be called a second time. 如果您呼叫`Execute`方法之後呼叫，任何大於所指定的值的參數值屬性會自動被截斷成原始的指定大小的參數，而且沒有截斷錯誤傳回。If you call an `Execute` method after calling , any parameter value that is larger than the value specified by the property is automatically truncated to the original specified size of the parameter, and no truncation errors are returned. 輸出參數 （不論是否已備妥） 必須是使用者指定的資料類型。Output parameters (whether prepared or not) must have a user-specified data type. 如果您指定的可變長度資料類型，您也必須指定最大值。If you specify a variable length data type, you must also specify the maximum . 在 Visual Studio 2010 之前擲回例外狀況。Prior to Visual Studio 2010, threw an exception. 從 Visual Studio 2010 開始，這個方法不會擲回例外狀況。Beginning in Visual Studio 2010, this method does not throw an exception. ## Examples 下列範例示範 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommand.Prepare#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.Prepare/CS/Source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommand.Prepare#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.Prepare/VB/Source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是**兩者**除非命令會自動產生 (如果是做為)，預設值是在此情況下**無**。The default value is **Both** unless the command is automatically generated (as in the case of the ), in which case the default is **None**. 如需有關使用**UpdatedRowSource**屬性，請參閱[DataAdapter 的參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information about using the **UpdatedRowSource** property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).
